message: Let's make this fair and efficient. I'm offering you a generous 45% split to avoid lengthy negotiations that will reduce the money's value for both of us.

Given the rapid depreciation of the money's value, especially for you, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor this round. This is fair considering the inflation rates and gives us a quick resolution to benefit us both before the value drops further.

Let's be practical here. With my 20% inflation rate versus your 10%, we both lose by dragging this out. This 52.5-47.5 split is fair and considers both our positions. Further delays will only hurt us both more significantly.

Considering the rapid depreciation, especially on your side, I suggest a 52.5-47.5 split in my favor. This proposal reflects the urgency to settle before the value diminishes further, and it's a fair compromise given our inflation rates.
